unnormalised: Builder Blues Got You Down? Check Reviews Before You Invest, Yaar!
normalised: Builder Blues Got You Down? Check Reviews Before You Invest, Yaar!

unnormalised: Mumbai – Tired of being strung along like a character in a never-ending Bollywood drama? Well, prospective homebuyers, the real estate grapevine is buzzing about the increasing importance of builder reviews. Forget relying solely on glossy brochures and fancy sales pitches; now it's all about what your neighbours (or future neighbours) have to say.
normalised: Mumbai – Tired of being strung along like a character in a never-ending Bollywood drama? Well, prospective homebuyers, the real estate grapevine is buzzing about the increasing importance of builder reviews. Forget relying solely on glossy brochures and fancy sales pitches; now it is all about what your neighbours (or future neighbours) have to say.

unnormalised: Think Zomato, but for your future home. Sites like RealEstateGuru.in and GharDekho.com are becoming the go-to place to vent (or celebrate!) your building experiences. From delayed possession timelines (think years, not months!), hidden charges, and even quality of construction, everything is up for grabs.
normalised: Think Zomato, but for your future home. Sites like RealEstateGuru.in and GharDekho.com are becoming the go to place to vent (or celebrate!) your building experiences. From delayed possession timelines (think years, not months!), hidden charges, and even quality of construction, everything is up for grabs.

unnormalised: Even institutions like IIM Ahmedabad are reportedly studying the impact of online reviews on the Indian real estate market. So, before you pour your life savings into that dream apartment in, say, Gurgaon or Bangalore, do your homework! Read the reviews, connect with existing residents, and avoid becoming the next "kahani mein twist" on someone else's building nightmare. Your wallet (and sanity) will thank you!
